requests.name: Get messages from folder, filtered by query
requests.description: The query string should have the following view.  The example of a simple expression:     ,  where <Field Name> - the name of a message field through which filtering is made, <Comparison operator> - comparison operators, as their name implies, allow to compare message field and specified value, <Field value> - value to be compared with a message field.  The number of simple expressions can make a compound one, ex.: ( & ) | ,  where "&" - logical-AND operator, "|" - logical-
